title: Most popular social media sites in Norway 2019 , by platform
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The highest Platform Facebook has 81.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Platform Tumblr.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The highest Platform Facebook has 81.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Platform Tumblr.
Share of respondents at Platform Facebook is 83.0 , second place is  at 83.0, and thirdly is YouTube at 60.0.
Similar Share of respondents is found in Platform Pinterest, and Whatsapp.
The Platform Tumblr tends to be 2.43 percent lower than average.
The Share of respondents is 342.0 if we add up values of all Platforms.
